content.rendered:
2023 Australian Open Getaway Rates

Rates based on a package including two nights hotel stay and premium tickets for two tennis sessions. Customize your package with extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagePackages From
Doubletree by Hilton Hotel Melbourne$2,165
Crown Promenade Melbourne$2,415
Park Hyatt Melbourne$2,675
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2023 Australian Open Semifinals & Finals Package Rates

Rates based on a package including five nights hotel stay and premium tickets for all five sessions of Semifinals & Finals. Customize your package with extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagePackages From
Crown Promenade Melbourne$9,975
Park Hyatt Melbourne$11,145
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
